title: Coroutines Basics Quiz
description: Test your understanding of coroutine fundamentals.

questions.question: What keyword is used to define a function that can be suspended?
questions.explanation: The 'suspend' keyword marks a function that can be paused and resumed, making it a suspending function.

questions.question: Which builder starts a new coroutine that does NOT block the current thread?
questions.explanation: launch starts a new coroutine without blocking the current thread. runBlocking blocks the current thread until its body completes.
